dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Hey B, did you catch this article about, um, digitalization in Kazakhstan? It's pretty wild.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Hey B, did you catch this article about, um, digitalization in Kazakhstan? It's pretty wild.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Oh, yeah! The one about Kaspi.kz? I saw that. Like, Mikheil Lomtadze saying they've had colossal changes?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Oh, yeah! The one about Kaspi dot k z? I saw that. Like, Mikheil Lomtadze saying they've had colossal changes?
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: During the meeting of the Commission on Digitalization under the President of the Republic of Kazakhstan, Mikheil Lomtadze said: In the last few years Kazakhstan has seen colossal changes in the area of digitalization.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Exactly! And the fact that Kaspi.kz is now one of the biggest fintech companies globally, but it was, uh, created right there in Kazakhstan. That's just wild to me.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Exactly! And the fact that Kaspi dot k z is now one of the biggest fintech companies globally, but it was, uh, created right there in Kazakhstan. That's just wild to me.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Today Kaspi.kz is one of the biggest fintech companies in the world. And it was created in Kazakhstan.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Totally. And their main goal is, like, making people's lives better by improving services. It's not just tech for tech's sake.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Totally. And their main goal is, like, making people's lives better by improving services. It's not just tech for tech's sake.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The main goal of digital transformation is to make peoples lives better. To do this it is necessary to improve the quality of services that people regularly use.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Right? He was talking about how they've launched service after service with all these different government bodies â€“ Ministry of Digital Development, Finance...
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Right? He was talking about how they've launched service after service with all these different government bodies - Ministry of Digital Development, Finance...
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: We have joint projects with the Ministry of Digital Development, Ministry of Finance, State Revenue Committee, Ministry of Labour, Ministry of the Interior and National Information Technologies JSC.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: [interrupts] Yeah, and the Ministry of Interior! It sounds like they're really integrated. They even said these services make lives better "right here, right now."
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yeah, and the Ministry of Interior! It sounds like they're really integrated. They even said these services make lives better right here, right now.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: We have joint projects with the Ministry of Digital Development... Ministry of the Interior... The services we have launched make peoples lives better right here, right now.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Which, um, is a pretty bold claim, but then you read about the vehicle ownership registration. Like, you can do that all through the Kaspi.kz Super App?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Which, um, is a pretty bold claim, but then you read about the vehicle ownership registration. Like, you can do that all through the Kaspi dot k z Super App?
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: At the exhibition, Mikheil demonstrated to President Tokayev, Kaspi.kzs vehicle ownership registration, available using the Kaspi.kz Super App.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Yeah! And over seven million citizens visit that government services section. That's a huge number.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yeah! And over seven million citizens visit that government services section. That's a huge number.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Over 7 million Kazakhstan citizens, our valued customers, visit the Government services section in the Kaspi.kz Super App.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: It is! And the fact that they've completely digitized the procedure to change vehicle ownership. They called it "unique by global standards."
dialogue_turns.tts_text: It is! And the fact that they've completely digitized the procedure to change vehicle ownership. They called it unique by global standards.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: We have completely digitized the procedure to change vehicle ownership. This is a unique by global standards.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Which, I mean, that's impressive. And now, like, every third vehicle in the country is registered online using the app.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Which, I mean, that's impressive. And now, like, every third vehicle in the country is registered online using the app.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: At this moment, every third vehicle in the country is registered fully online using the Kaspi.kz Super App, said Mikheil.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: That's just... that's incredible. And it's not just cars, either. They're moving child social security benefits online too.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: That's just... that's incredible. And it's not just cars, either. They're moving child social security benefits online too.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Mikheil Lomtadze also commented that the application for child social security benefits is also moving online.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Oh, yeah! So parents don't have to go to a Public Service Centre, um, anymore? No more paper documents?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Oh, yeah! So parents don't have to go to a Public Service Centre, um, anymore? No more paper documents?
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Parents no longer need to visit the Public Service Centre and present paper documents. Just fill in the application online on the Kaspi.kz Super App.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Exactly! Just fill it out online. And that means, you know, parents can spend more time with their kids instead of doing paperwork. Which is a huge win.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Exactly! Just fill it out online. And that means, you know, parents can spend more time with their kids instead of doing paperwork. Which is a huge win.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Now parents can spend more time with their children instead of visiting Public Service Centre to do legal paperwork, - added Mikheil.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Absolutely. That's, uh, a direct impact on quality of life. And President Tokayev even weighed in, wishing them "further success."
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Absolutely. That's, uh, a direct impact on quality of life. And President Tokayev even weighed in, wishing them further success.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: I wish you further success!, - said President Kassym-Zhomart Tokayev in response.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Yeah, for their history of success both in Kazakhstan and, um, increasingly abroad. It really shows what's possible with digital transformation.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yeah, for their history of success both in Kazakhstan and, um, increasingly abroad. It really shows what's possible with digital transformation.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: I think that we all need to accept your history of success both in Kazakhstan and increasingly abroad. I wish you further success!, - said President Kassym-Zhomart Tokayev in response.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: It really does. Pretty inspiring stuff coming out of Kazakhstan, actually.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: It really does. Pretty inspiring stuff coming out of Kazakhstan, actually.
